import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { ReactComponent as CartSvg} from '../../../icons/cart.svg' import { Context } from '../../../context/detailHandler' const AddProduct = ({product, addToCard, handleLinkClick}) => { const values = useContext(Context) return (
Name: {product.name}
Price: {product.price.toFixed(2)}$
Origin: {product.origin.toUpperCase()}
ha}>
) } export default AddProduct;
